description.long: Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and accuracy by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

description.short: Enhances Damage, Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
description.long: Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}% and endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.  NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

description.short: Enhances Accuracy, Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
description.long: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}% and endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.  NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

description.short: Enhances Accuracy, Damage, Recharge, and Reduces Endurance Cost
description.long: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.

UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives a chance to reduce your foes' damage resistance by 20%.  This effect will trigger roughly 3.5 times per minute.  NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses.  You get the set bonuses not marked ""(PvP)"" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.
